class.name: MouseState
class.preview: The state of a mouse input device, including mouse cursor position and buttons pressed.

class.name: KeyState
class.preview: Identifies the state of a keyboard key.

class.name: Keys
class.preview: Identifies a particular key on a keyboard.

class.name: KeyboardState
class.preview: Represents a state of keystrokes recorded by a keyboard input device.

class.name: Keyboard
class.preview: Allows retrieval of keystrokes from a keyboard input device.
